Messages.Author: Martin Henk
Messages.Content: Wir haben gerade feststellen müssen,  dass das HFT Gebäude, in dem morgen das Seminar stattfinden soll, wegen (teilweiser) Einsturzgefahr geschlossen ist :-) Wir treffen uns daher um 12:00 im E 220.    Viele Grüße   Martin Henk

Messages.Author: Martin Henk
Messages.Content: The seminar will take place at June 28th, July 12th and July 19th. We start at 12:00 s.t. and the room is 340 in the building HFT-TA.

Messages.Author: Martin Henk
Messages.Content: In this semester's seminar, we will be studying Sinai Robins' forthcoming book Fourier analysis on polytopes, and the geometry of numbers,  part I:   a friendly introduction. A free preliminary (and extended) version  can be downloaded here (arXiv:2104.06407). A solid background in Convex/Discrete Geometry and Analysis is needed !  The first meeting will take place at Thursday, April 18th, at 12:15 in MA 649 -- see you!
